youtube.title: Real Footage of Human Heart Valves Opening and Closing
youtube.description: See the incredible mechanism of the 'Gatekeepers of your Heart.' This video shows a close-up view of heart valves functioning in real-time. Learn how the tricuspid and mitral valves prevent backflow to keep you alive. Perfect for biology students and science enthusiasts! #Cardiology #Anatomy
